issue.title: [Urban Feature] Access to simulation robot logfile?

content.raw:
@{5cf75629ff02b50ea27b2817} is this feature already implemented in release 2019-11-14? I tried 

‌

```
165.884000000 INFO /subt_solution [/home/developer/subt_solution/src/subt_seed/src/subt_seed_node.cc:214(Update)] [topics: /rosout] Sent start signal.
165.908000000 INFO /subt_solution [/home/developer/subt_solution/src/subt_seed/src/subt_seed_node.cc:51(clockCallback)] [topics: /rosout, /X0F300R/cmd_vel, /X0F300R/robot_data] received Clock 0 
166.144000000 INFO /X0F300R/ros1_ign_bridge_twist [/tmp/ros1-ign-bridge-release/include/ros1_ign_bridge/factory.hpp:137(Factory<ROS1_T, IGN_T>::ros1_callback)] [topics: /rosout] Passing message from ROS1 geometry_msgs/Twist to Ignition ignition.msgs.Twist (showing msg only once per type
166.160000000 INFO /subt_solution [/home/developer/subt_solution/src/subt_seed/src/subt_seed_node.cc:59(imuCallback)] [topics: /rosout, /X0F300R/cmd_vel, /X0F300R/robot_data] received Imu 0 
166.164000000 INFO /subt_solution [/home/developer/subt_solution/src/subt_seed/src/subt_seed_node.cc:83(odomCallback)] [topics: /rosout, /X0F300R/cmd_vel, /X0F300R/robot_data] received Odom 0 
```

i.e. `/NAME/robot_data` and again without any ROS bag :disappointed:  … did anybody else tried?

i.e. /NAME/robot_data and again without any ROS bag … did anybody else tried?
